articles.title: Anti-vaxxers, anti-maskers and conspiracists: US has become a melting pot for anti-science 'viruses' - Global Times

articles.title: LOOK: Filipina doctor has Barbie doll made after her - Rappler
articles.description: Audrey Sue Cruz is the first Filipina-American doctor to have a Barbie doll made in her likeness
articles.content: "Im SO incredibly honored. Heres to breaking barriers, speaking truths, and empowering the next generation," Cruz, 31, wrote in an August 4 Instagram post, holding up the first Barbie doll made in he… [+10 chars]

articles.title: Canada wants the U.S. to negotiate for its hostages - The Globe and Mail
